verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
To keep Your lovely face
Ever before my eyes,
This is my prayer,
Make it my strong desire;
That in my secret heart
No other love competes,
No rival throne survives
And I serve only You.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
To keep Your lovely face
Ever before our eyes
This is our prayer
Make it our strong desire
That in our secret heart
No other love competes
No rival throne survives
And we serve only You
